solution_line_template: Three times as many days as a typical person has fingers and toes is {multiplier}*{fingers_and_toes_count}=<<{multiplier}*{fingers_and_toes_count}={total_suspended_days}>>{total_suspended_days} days
Three days per instance of bullying is {total_suspended_days}/{days_per_instance}=<<{total_suspended_days}/{days_per_instance}={instances_of_bullying}>>{instances_of_bullying} instances of bullying.
